summary: A unit test suite that validates the token refresh behavior of an authentication client under different token ages and Azure Active Directory (AAD) availability scenarios, confirming whether new tokens are fetched, old tokens are retained, or errors are raised, and that fresh tokens are served from cache.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable and secure token management by testing that the client correctly decides when to refresh tokens based on expiration thresholds and external service status, thereby preventing authentication failures.
